#summary The document.getElementById method
#labels about-dom,is-dom-method

== Arguments ==

_string_ - The ID of an element as a string to retrieve.

== Usage ==
{{{
var objElement = document.getElementById("element_id");
/* The variable objElement now contains the element object associated with the given ID. */
}}}
